statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM suppliers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_name FROM suppliers WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE city='New York' OR city='Los Angeles';
SELECT supplier_name, address, city, state FROM suppliers WHERE country='Canada';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, city FROM suppliers WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_name, city, postal_code FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'Canada' AND city = 'Vancouver';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE state = 'New York' AND postal_code LIKE '%5';
SELECT supplier_name, address, city, state, country FROM suppliers WHERE postal_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY country, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_name, product_category FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, last_order_date FROM supplier_data ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND supplier_location = 'California';
SELECT supplier_name AS name, supplier_location AS location FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data ORDER BY last_order_date DESC, supplier_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_orders FROM supplier_data GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 5
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_location = 'USA'
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_data WHERE last_order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_type FROM suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type='Manufacturer' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, revenue, profitability FROM suppliers JOIN performance_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_metrics.supplier_id WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY profitability DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Manufacturer' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price, product_category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_category, price ASC
SELECT supplier_name, revenue, profitability FROM suppliers JOIN performance_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_metrics.supplier_id WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY profitability DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address, phone_number FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value FROM suppliers JOIN performance_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_metrics.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM suppliers JOIN performance_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_metrics.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT orders.order_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(delivery_performance) AS best_performance FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY supplier_id;
